header.title: Product Launch Event
header.project: Dan Savi Car Showcase & Shaver Gaming Event
header.purpose: Discuss the planning, budgeting, and logistical aspects of the Dan Savi Car Showcase and Shaver Gaming events, including media invites, vendor coordination, safety measures, and potential cross-promotions.
header.attendees: Alia, Rohimi, Azfar, Kang, Jet, Sebastian

tasks.Description: Finalize the exact power strip specifications for the Dan Savi car showcase layout.
Follow up on Klang Sound's quote and availability for the sound system.
Inform the client upstairs to stick with the Center Court for the car showcase.
Push Jumbo Rentals for at least a 10% cut on the sound system rental.
Draft the Shaver Gaming media invites and lock in Can Lim's Twitch slot.
Handle the Dan Savi media invites.
Confirm the custom rack specs with Tech Zone and email the dash dimensions to the use partner for Shaver Gaming.
Submit the police traffic permit applications for both events.
Follow up with the fire department regarding the COVID-19 SOP and fire safety clearance for both events.
Ping the vendor directly and get a concrete delivery date for the VR demo gear for Shaver Gaming and update the shared document.
Map out specific routes and timings for loading and unloading cars and gaming equipment.
Coordinate with mall operators to ensure minimal disruption to mallgoers during setup and tear down for both events.
Talk to esports channels about featuring a segment on the CYD Nova EV and reach out to Autobus regarding a casual gaming peripheral review tied to the Shaver Gaming event.
Reach out to Xbox and Logitech, the Shaver gaming sponsors, to explore cross-promotional opportunities.
Get the fire safety audit clearance sorted.
